I would suggest the following:
        testLogging {
            displayGranularity 1
            showStackTraces = true
            exceptionFormat = 'full'
            events "STARTED", "PASSED", "FAILED", "SKIPPED"
        }
but okay :)

nodes.bodyText: I wanted to specifically avoid STARTED and PASSED, as it creates a lot of noise (10K+ lines of logs that don't tell much). STARTED can be useful sometimes when dealing with a hanging test though, but in that case I would activate it temporarily rather than having it on all the time. Plus having the test class logged would already point us in some direction in that case.
